TopicTitle: Which mod shows ejection angle as an overlay in orbital map view?

Articles.Content:
Yesterday i activated this overlay by accident, but i have no idea which mod it was. I have most popular mods installed so i'm thinking it might be Mechjeb, Kerbal Engineer Redux or Trajectories, but realistically, it could be anything.

Anyone know which mod is able to show ejection angle as an overlay in the orbital map view and how i can pull this up?
Recently transfer window planner added a button to show ejection angle. Is that what you have in your mind?
That was it! Thank you so much!
